location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Shirauz [Shiraz], to Captain Charles Sealy, Commander of the HC Cruizer Ternateand Senior Marine Officer in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing an extract (not present) of a letter from the Chief Secretary to Government in Council concerning the stationing of cruizers on the pearl bank during the fishing season.
